definition[0]: a light with a very bright beam which can be directed at someone or something. Spotlights are often used to light a stage when actors or singers are performing
example[0]: The yard was lit by three huge spotlights.
example[1]: I was sweating under the spotlights.
example[2]: She stepped into the spotlight and began to sing.
definition[1]: to direct attention to someone or something
example[3]: The article spotlights the problems of the homeless.
definition[2]: to shine a strong beam of light on something
example[4]: She walked out onto the spotlit stage.
